title: December Rain
description: Monica and Alex Waters have spent that last few months repairing their broken marriage. Just as they find their spark, Quinn Matthews and his escalating career resurface.Monica twists down a destructive path that alienates her from her closest friends and lands her in the one place she was trying to avoid... Quinn’s couch. Despite her efforts to resist jumping into his arms again, the spark between them reignites on a whirlwind holiday. She finds that falling in love with Quinn’s family and lifestyle is as easy as falling for him. Too easy. Quinn's reinvented life seems ripped from her dreams, and she starts to question whether he’s too good to be true.Will Monica be able to trust another man with secrets? She will have to decide soon because Quinn has his happily ever after in sight and is not about to let her again.
author: A.L. Goulden
